11.title: Squashers

111.content:
Bertha the Hippo, TAW's poster girl. For the moment, at least. Recently Bertha had begun to get worried about her position, feeling un-unique. The federation had girls who specialized in gas, like Aroma or even Enorma.. it had fast girls like Jiggly.. and it had girls even heavier than her, like Jumba!

To boost her confidence, Bertha had begun training regularly. Not her normal training though, this was SQUASH training. She'd be the most skillful squasher if nothing else, and has recruited the small jobber, Seat the Squirrel, as her partner. Seat was happy to do it. It was painful and tiring, but at least Bertha was kind, and working with her reduced the chances of her having to be partner to one of TAW's.. crueler wrestlers.

Currently though, Seat was having a fabulous time, as Bertha laid on her stomach, carefully tensing first her left butt cheek, then her right, and skillfully bouncing the tiny jobber between them. A showy move, but one that would please the crowd. Bertha was wearing her usual outfit, purple top and tight black shorts - what was the point of training if you weren't in the clothes you performed in?

After a few more bounces, Bertha nodded back to Seat that more intense practice was about to start.

Bertha prepared herself. It was time for..
111.title: Bertha the Hippo

choices: Seat attempts to escape from Bertha's ass.

"Are you prepared for your next training Seat?" Bertha smirked and pushes herself up at the training ring, looking over small squirrel.
"Oh what's next?" Seat looked slightly worried seeing huge fat hippo towering before her and even more when Bertha begun to climb on the practice ring pole. Her black shorts barely containing all her purple ass. "Oh the next is simple ass drop." Bertha grins as she turns around bending her knees over the strong custom ropes to support her 7000+lbs weight. "A-ass drop?" Seat whimpered and much for her amaze she saw Bertha jumping high in the air and starting to fall like comet over her, like an assteroid. "Uh oh...."

BOOM!

With huge boom Bertha lands on poor little squirrel. Seat could only feel heavy fat Bertha and her multi-ton ass over her poor limp body. The weight and pain was unbearable for her. Bertha sighs at relaxation of successfull ass drop and watches her jiggling ass seemingly having swallowed entire Seat.
"You did well Seat. How you are holding up?"
1111.title: Ass drop training!

choices: Jobber stays, but knows he's fucked
The rabbit girl tumbles out of the car
1151.content:
I sat in my dressing room, a huge smile on my face. It was my debut appearance for this big-time wrestling organization. They’d been overjoyed with my auditions and had signed me up immediately as their new big thing... literally. My contract was befitting for a woman of my size and stature, and for tonight’s appearance alone I was being paid a million dollars.

“Give ‘em the best and most amazing spectacle they’ve ever seen,” the head of T.A.W said to me a few days ago, and that was exactly what I was going to do. Whoever was facing me in that ring tonight had no idea what was in store for them. But one thing was for sure – they wouldn’t be walking out of the stadium once I was through.

There was a gentle knock on my door and a woman’s voice said timidly, “urrm, excuse me, Jumba, this is your curtain call.”

My smile grew, and I raised myself to my full height, the ultra-reinforced bench I’d been sitting on groaning and creaking with relief at my departure. I walked across my huge spacious dressing room and opened the over-sized door. Standing in the corridor by the wall was a woman much smaller than me, a bunny girl, but that was nothing new – everybody was smaller than me. I took a step forward and was now standing right next to her, towering over her and utterly dwarfing her petite 5’0 petite frame. She swallowed hard, and I suddenly noticed that her whole body was trembling in my vast shadow. I was super-horny at the prospect of the fun I was about to have in the ring, and so I decided to enjoy a little warm-up fun, too.

I reached one of my huge arms down and wrapped my big, soft hand around her throat. I lifted her easily off the floor so she was dangling in mid-air, her eyes level with me. “I’ll give you two choices, girl,” I said menacingly, “option one is I slam my full weight against this wall and crush over eighty percent of the bones in your body to dust without even breaking a sweat...”

She shook her head desperately as her eyes bulged out of their sockets. She grappled with her tiny, manicured hands at my huge, thick wrist that she couldn’t come near to closing her hands around and whimpered pathetically.

“or,” I continued, “you can see what I have in store for you in about a minute’s time. Of course, for all you know, that could be me giving you a suitcase full of cash, or it could be me throwing you into the ring and splashing you, full weight, just for fun.”

I lowered her down the wall a little, and stepped forward slightly. My vast spandex-covered belly was now about an inch from her tiny, terrified body. Still gasping for air, she continued to try and wriggle free of my iron grip. It wasn’t going to happen.

“So,” I growled, “do you gamble and hope that option B is something nice? Or do you accept option A, knowing that I’ll crush you flatter than a pancake, but at least I’ll make it quick for you. Like I said, option B could be a steak dinner, or I might spend ten minutes slowly crushing your skinny-ass to amuse the huge crowd out there – I’m sure they’d love to listen to your agonized screaming as I slowly roll my bulk over your little rib cage.” I stepped forward some more so that she could feel some belly flab begin to press against her. “Snap, snap, snap, snap.”

I let out a booming laugh and released my grip, taking a small step backwards. In my huge shadow, the woman fell in a heap and coughed and gasped, clutching her throat. “N... no...! Please!”

I boomed down at her. “Ten seconds, girl, and then I decide for you. And trust me... you DON’T want that.”

“Please, Jumba, please don’t do this. I beg you!”

“Five seconds, girl.”

She screamed desperately, “option B! Please! Option B! Just please don’t crush me!”

I smiled. “Good choice. Let’s go and have some fun.”

==========================================================================
The enormous curtains covering the specially enlarged doorway pulled apart and I stepped out into the blazing spotlights. There was a collective gasp as the audience suddenly realized just how massive an eight-foot tall elaphant who weighed well over one and a half tons was. I stood there and slowly panned my head around the stunned audience who were now beginning to clap and cheer, a sense of just how badly this jobber was going to get hurt beginning to dawn on them.

The tiny clipboard bunny was standing behind me, completely obscured by my massively wide hips and legs, her pathetic whimpering now drowned out by the audience, some of whom were standing and cheering me. I reached behind me and grabbed hold of the scruff of her neck, bunching up her silky blouse, and I effortlessly lifted her into view, holding her high above me to make sure everyone got a good view. Once again, a big gasp came from the audience as they saw the terrified little rabbit squirming in my vise-like grip.

I looked down the walkway and into the ring; I could almost smell the fear from the jobber I was about to demolish. His eyes were wide and his mouth had dropped open, and I had no doubt that his legs would be trembling. I pointed at him and then at the skinny woman, before mouthing the words, ‘you’re next’. I wasn’t sure he could understand what I’d said, but he’d get the idea shortly.

Suddenly, a powerful spotlight was illuminated, just as we’d rehearsed, and its beam shone directly down onto something most people hadn’t noticed before: a brand new white Fiat 500 was between me and the ring. I walked up to it, slamming my feet down to increase the vibrations that the people seated near me would feel, and stopped. I looked down at the tiny car, and then at the skinny bunny in my grip. I smiled at her, and she began to panic even more. Although she didn’t know what I had in mind, she knew it probably wouldn’t be good for her.

“I actually quite like you,” I bellowed to her over the noise of the crowd, who were now going apoplectic with excitement, “so I’ll give you a bit of advice. Passenger footwell.”

She screwed her face up slightly, not understanding, so I continued. “You and I are going to have a date sometime very soon, so I don’t want you injured too badly. I’ll say again: passenger footwell.”

She gibbered and squirmed, but I ignored her and leaned down to open the tiny door. I looked her in the face and smiled as tears flowed down her cheeks. “Good luck!”

“N… no! Oh God please, NO! Massive Momma! I’m begging you, please don’t--”

I shoved her puny body into the car and slammed the door; the locks automatically activated, so she wasn’t going anywhere. Now the crowd was intrigued.

==========================================================================
Jobber Fox was shaking like a leaf as he watched the behemoth of a elaphant effortlessly throw some poor rabbit into the car and slam the door. The woman banged on the windows frantically, but the gigantic wrestler ignored her and turned to face Jobber. She looked him right in the eyes and gave the fox an evil smile. Her belly and boobs were gigantic, but so was her immense ass and thighs, all of which had been crammed into a woefully inadequate lycra one-piece swimsuit-type thing, and every single roll and wave of fat and flab was trying to burst out of it.

Before he knew what was going on, the massive mountain of bulk slowly sat her one and a half tons of weight down onto the roof of the car! Her ass was so incredibly wide that it covered the entire area of the car, and still had some to spare. The crowd had gone completely silent as they looked on this incredible scene; they were certainly getting their money’s worth tonight.

Jobber heard a loud clunk as the body of the car hit the floor, its shocks compressed totally, and then the groaning of tortured metal began to fill the air. Muffled screams could also be faintly heard from the terrified Rabbit inside the car.

==========================================================================
I heard the tiny car bottom out and then felt the roof begin to crumple under my gigantic ass. The little bunny in the car was still pleading for her life, and I casually wondered whether she’d taken my advice on board or not. If not, she’d be enjoying a many-month hospital stay quite soon, but if she had curled herself into the passenger footwell, she should survive pretty much unscathed; I planned to go easy on that small area of the car. I really did want a date night with the scrawny little thing.

Suddenly, shattering glass noises echoed around the arena, the frames for the windows now bent too far out of shape, and the previously muted screaming was now loud and for all to hear. A huge cracking noise came from under the car somewhere, and I figured an axel had just snapped or perhaps the suspension had lost its fight with my weight.

I’d reached the tipping point of balance, and couldn’t really control my descent any more, so I leaned back and let my full weight drop onto the tiny car. The roof buckled and crumpled immediately under my one and a half ton weight, and then the rest of the car’s body crumpled under me, too. I was deliberately leaning my weight slightly away from the passenger side, focusing it on the driver’s side and the rear seats instead.

Finally, my massive bulk came to a halt, and I sat there enjoying listening to the echoes of the mangled, crushed metal fade around me. I could also hear sobbing and whimpering from somewhere underneath me; perhaps she’d made it into the footwell after all. The crowd went totally wild and everybody leapt to their feet, screaming and cheering with delight at what they’d just seen.
1151.title: Jumba Elephant

choices: Jumba takes the long, utter domination way
11512.content:
I reached the ring and could tell that the pathetic jobber about to wrestle me was absolutely terrified. He was trembling all over and couldn’t tear his eyes away from my immense bulk as my tons of flab wobbled and jiggled, stretching my reinforced spandex outfit well beyond its limits.

Because of my height, I was actually taller than my opponent and the ref despite the fact that they were already in the ring. I lifted one of my massive legs up and placed my foot on the outside of the ring before grabbing the post in my left hand and hauling my colossal weight up. The whole ring lurched to one side and some satisfying cracks and snaps came from somewhere underneath. I smiled as the ref and the jobber staggered around trying to keep their balance.

In one smooth motion, I lifted my vast leg up, place my huge foot on the top rope and leaned my weight onto that leg. All three ropes were instantly pushed down onto the floor of the ring, the posts they were attached to groaning and creaking loudly. I stepped into the ring and released the ropes from under my right foot. They sprang back up with relief, but weren’t as taught as they had been; I’d either stretched the ropes beyond their capacity, or I’d bent the posts. Either way, it was quite an entrance.

As a final display of just how incredibly heavy I was, I did a little jump and landed my full weight, feet first, onto the canvas of the ring.

=========================================================================

The whole ring suddenly shook as if an earthquake had begun. Jobber quickly grabbed the rope nearest to him and managed to just about stay on my feet. The ref wasn’t so lucky, and he lost his balance and collapsed to the floor of the ring. He couldn’t believe what I’d just seen: my immense opponent had just effortlessly pressed all of the highly tensed ropes to the floor of the ring, bending two metal posts in the process. The canvas ring floor where she was standing was now compressed down into a dent under where her huge feet were.

Jobber looked up at her in horror, and her cold eyes were fixed on his. To say he was terrified would be an understatement, and in fact Jobber was not sure there is actually an adequate word to describe the level of fear coursing through his body at that moment. The woman was absolutely, indescribably gargantuan. Her height was incredible, but her demonstration of what one and a half tons of woman can do was both breathtaking and horrifying at the same time.

Jobber wanted nothing else than to leap over the ropes and run for his life. Nobody in their right mind would get into a ring with someone of that size and attempt to fight them, but he didn’t have a choice. Jobber's contract was quite specific on this matter: if he bailed on a match once he saw my opponent, then he was immediately out of a job and also owed T.A.W all of the money they’d paid him over the last few years, and that added up to millions which he no longer had. Jobber always thought they assumed he would have a freak out if some dude with big muscles was my opponent, but that didn’t bother him. Facing a woman who had just crushed an entire car simply by sitting on it, did.

The ref called them together to run through the rules as usual, and Jobber swallowed hard as his trembling legs took him unsteadily towards the center of the ring. The behemoth in the opposite corner hadn’t taken her cruel-looking eyes off him once, and she too took a step towards the center. The entire ring shook as she put her foot down, distorting the canvas underneath it.

==========================================================================
The jobber looked scared out of his wits as, I supposed, I would be if I was about to wrestle someone over seventeen times my weight. But that wasn’t my problem, I thought with a smile.

It took me just three steps for the end of my massive belly to reach the center of the ring. My body is so enormous that I took up about a fifth of the total space available in the ring. The jobber needed well over ten terrified, trembling steps before he stood in my immense shadow. I peered down at him over the vast expanse of my belly and gave him a cruel smile that let him know, if there was any doubt, that he was in huge trouble.

The ref began to run through the usual blurb about one fall or pin, but I ignored him and growled down to my doomed opponent. “Ready to have some fun, little Fox?”

He jabbered a response, stuttering and fumbling his words as they tumbled out of his mouth. “Oh god! Please! I’m begging you, go easy on me! Please! I’m just a jobber! You know you’re going to win, so you don’t need to…”

I cut him off. “The crowd wants a good show from my debut appearance, and that’s what they’re going to get. The medics are going to have to peel you off the canvas about thirty painful minutes from now. Get ready to feel my full weight, jobber boy.”

==========================================================================
“Holy fuck! NO!” Jobber pleaded with the massive pachyderm, his head tipped fully back as he strained to look up, past her immense belly and into her eyes. “Please! You don’t need to wrestle me! Let’s just make it look good! I’m begging you!”

He had never been so scared his my life, and Jumba seemed to be enjoying every single moment of his terror. She smiled down at the fox as the ref finished his spiel and shook her head.

Her voice was deep as she replied. “Oh, it’ll look good. Don’t you worry about that. If you’re religious, now would be a good time to say your prayers. May the heaviest wrestler win. No, scratch that, may the heaviest wrestler crush their opponent to a paste.”

He began to plead with her again, but she turned her massive bulk around, nearly knocking the ref and Jobber to the floor with her terrifyingly huge thigh and took a couple of steps back to her corner. He couldn’t believe how much space she took up, or how the ring swayed and sank each time she put her foot down.

Jobber suddenly realized that the match was about to start, and the crowd was going wild. Once that bell rang, he would be at the mercy of a massive Elaphant who weighed over one and a half tons, and there was nothing he could do about it. He couldn’t even attempt to fight back against someone so heavy and evidently very strong, so He'd just have to try and stay out of her way for the duration of the match, which would be no easy feat.

The bell rang, and His heart sank
11512.title: Jobber stays, but knows he's fucked

115121.content:
A nanosecond later, the fat elephant’s belly smashed Jobber against the ring at considerable speed. Jobber’s breath erupted out of him in a huge rush as his lungs were compressed against the stretchy, nigh indestructible ropes that formed the walls of the ring. His extremely large assailant’s belly immediately engulfed him, and crushed his entire upper body flat against the wall. His ribs felt like they were about to snap, and his insides compressed suddenly, sending a cascade of pain throughout Jobber’s comparably tiny body; he tried to scream in agony, but had no breath to do so. The bulk pinning him to the wall remained in place, and Jobber’s head span as he silently endured the crushing weight against him.

Ten seconds of agony later, just as he was about to pass out, Jobber was released from the crushing flab of Jumba’s stomach. The thin fox immediately collapsed to the ring floor in a heap, gasping desperately for much-needed breath. A large arm reached down and effortlessly picked him up; Jobber, in his dazed and oxygen-deprived state, thought he was flying. He didn’t know what was going on until he landed hard on hos back on the cold surface of the ring.

Jobber opened his eyes and saw stars. His vision was blurry and his back was in pain. As he managed to focus, Jobber saw the massive figure of Jumba above him, bending down and staring at his face. For a split second he could scarcely make out a wink, but he passed it off as another spinning star in his peripheral vision.

Jobber watched in horror as the gargantuan elaphant turned her monumental bulk around. He was now looking up at Jumba’s eighteen-ton ass, her blue spandex wrestling piece packed to capacity, the seams ripping apart in several places.

“Oh god! Jumba! No! PLEASE!”

Slowly, Jumba began to sit down. Her titanic ass was so wide that it stretched way past the length of his body. She only needed one colossal ass cheek to flatten it. She didn’t even acknowledge his desperate pleas and continued to sit her gigantic ass down. In a matter of seconds, the blue material of her spandex began to press against the fox. Her single ass cheek totally dwarfed his entire body. Jobber had the presence of mind to turn his head to the side so she didn’t immediately crush his nose, but other than that he was paralyzed with fear.

And then the weight came. And it came quickly. Jobber had been sat on by big women before, 400 and 500lb Anthros, and when they first lowered their weight, there was always a period where the weight gently built up until there were many hundreds of pounds squashing him. It was all part of the job description for him. The first bit of weight that he felt from Jumba, however, was twice as heavy as anything he had ever felt before and it didn’t come gently. All of a sudden his body was being crushed against the floor of the ring by at least 1,000lbs of bulk, and immediately he was in total agony. Jobber could feel his ribs creaking while they were pressed towards his spine. All of his limbs were on fire as the bones endured a vast amount of pressure was put onto it.

Jobber felt some ribs crack and hisinternal organs felt like they were being turned to mush. He was in so much pain that he thought he was going to pass out. He don’t know how much extra weight she added, but it was at least 500lbs, maybe closer to another 1,000lbs, which would mean Jobber was being crushed into the floor of the ring by a ton of ass. He could hear the metal structure under the ring creaking and straining to resist the huge weight, and he screamed in agony, straight into the mountain of spandex-clad flab that was engulfing hid body. Jobber had no breath left, and his lungs were under so much weight that they couldn’t expand against the pressure.

Suddenly, mercifully, Jumba hauled her massive bulk to her full height and turned around. Jobber gasped loudly, and gulped down air, coughing and spluttering. Every movement and breath hurt, but it felt so good to have air in his lungs again.
115121.title: Jumba takes the simple way

115332221.content:
"First day as a jobber and the guy gets Lardo. Poor sap"

The whispers and glances of the other wrestlers made your spine shiver. You've never seen this "Lardo" before, but you've heard plenty about his rough, take-no-prisoners style of wrestling. If you were a weaker, less proud, and less broke man, you'd turn around and forfeit the match right now. But this was fast cash. All you had to do was go into the ring and lose. That was it. That was your job. Go in, lose, get paid. Simple right?

The loud crashing from the other side of the arena proved you wrong.

The giant, grey rat vaulted himself into to ring with and earth shaking crash, moving the ground under you. While the referee was introducing both the wrestlers, your mind went completely blank. You wished you had just turned back, but it was far too late.

As your mind was wandering, the 2-ton rat made his first move by...
115332221.title: Lardo

1153322212.content:
"Hey there, meat." The rat said, licking his lips, slowly circling his new toy. "Since you're new, I figured I should let you in on some things. Firstly, you're screwed. Secondly, there's only two way little twerps like you leave a match with me. Either ya leave in my gut..." the rat grinned, rubbing his fat stomach as he did. "Or ya leave plastered to my ass. If ya start begging now, I'll let you leave as a pancake and only keep you there three, maybe four days."

You stepped back in terror. Eating people? Turning them totally flat? He can't be serious.

Unfortunetly, being scared provided an opening, which Lardo used to..
1153322212.title: ...Taunting you.

choices: Is he showing mercy? Lardo gets up.
He somehow feels heavier. Try to wriggle out.
11533222122.content:
In seconds, Lardo made it clear he wasn't going to wait for your response by leaping into the air, his strong, fat coated legs propelling him to a surprising height for someone his size. Your mind had only a single thought: Get out of there. Your legs, however, froze in fear; you weren't going anywhere.

Unfortunately, what goes up must come down, and Lardo was coming down fast. Finally, you regained some control over your legs. You had to move, and fast. It was only a matter of time til-

SPLAT!

Too late! The giant rat fell down on you full force, trapping you underneath his grey, hairy, and most notably heavy rolls of fat. Much to your own disgust, you could tell the rotund rodent was chuckling, as his corpulent belly was bouncing on top of you. Literally tons of fat were pressing down on your body, pushing you deeper into the mat. You feel the threat of becoming flat has transformed into a very real possibility.

It would not be incorrect to assume a fight with him would be a death sentence, Jumbo can and will end a life with his massive body should he need to. However, killing his opponents in the TAW would surely get him kicked out. Not that he needs the money mind you, Jumbo enjoys the outlet TAW provides. Displaying his raw power and girth to flatten opponents in front of a crowd is an excellent destressor for the titan. And the crowds absolutely love him, his rear end has met face to face with many jobbers and some of the large wrestlers as well. He's a main attraction and Jumbo knows it.

Now we've talked about Jumbo for quite awhile the question is however, what happens next? He's sitting in his locker room yes, but is he waiting for his next match? Or perhaps events will unfold backstage?

121.content:
Jobber threw cold water into his face from the locker room sink, and stared at himself. It was the worst day of the year. TAW's fund-raising webcast. And he was the unlucky jobber that got picked out to be the victim of this year's torments.

Wrestling.. Wrestling was one thing. Get sat on or body slammed, occasionally get farted on, match was over, barring one of the girls wanting to torment him privately, which was bad but not terrible. But this.. this wasn't wrestling. He was going to be subject to anything the fans at home wanted him to be. And unfortunately for him, they were much more creative than the TAW writers. Even worse, being a webcast, anything could happen. He remembered watching last year's jobber disappear down Lardo's throat when donations got high enough. And the year before that, the girls blasting some white cat with so much gas his fur was STILL green.

Jobber threw more water into his face, and walked out to the ring, like a condemned man heading towards his execution.

As he climbed into a ring, two furred announced worked the viewers at home.

"And here's tonight's victim, Jobber Fox! Remember folks, you donate to decide his fate! Or should we say, 'end'?" One quipped, to laughter. "But until your suggestions and funds come in, we'll bring out the most requested wrestler to play with him to start this night off right! Here she comes, large and in charge, it's..."
121.title: Jobber Fox

choices: Jobber was able to duck the first clothesline
Jobber couldn't move out of the way in time
1211.content:
The Smelly Skunkette you all know and love...AROMA!!!!!

As the crowd erupted into cheers and clapping, Jobber's face palmed and held his hands over his eyes in fear and anger. "Of course they would pick her." he said quietly to himself.

Aroma came through the curtain and once again the crowd went crazy at the sight of the heavy skunkette, in response she smiled and waved, and blew kisses back in appreciation. Aroma was actually on the smaller side in terms of height in weight in the TAW and her squashing though very effective against people of normal size like Jobber Fox, or Rapid. It wasn't effective against some of the larger girls like Bertha or Jumba. However she has been able to counteract this disadvantage by utilizing her god given skunk gas powers against her opponents. She has the most powerful and smelly gas in the entire organization, she had a near infinte supply swirling around in that soft fluffy tummy of hers, not to mention she has complete control over how it smells. Though she usually uses her smelly gas to knock out her foe, she occasionally(only uses this move in jobber squash matches). uses her sweet smelling to make her foe temporarily fall in love with her, her luscious and soft backside, as well as her sweet gas. it's almost impossible to resist for long once you breath it in, and it takes a few hours for the effects to wear off leaving you at her mercy until then. Jobber knew the audience had picked her most likely for that very reason, and it made him even more furious. Bertha was massively taller than most other competitors, and was incredibly fat – her smooth, round belly was so big it almost made her body look like a vertical semi-circle from the side; or it least it would have done were it not for her butt, which pooled out behind her in two perfect globes of lard, melding sumptuously into her thighs, which were so big that they looked – as with the rest of her leg-fat and arm-fat – as though they were purple globules of dough trying to engulf her limbs. Short of that, the hippo used her sheer size and weight to dominate her opponents, crushing them against the mat or turnbuckles, using an exotic set of bellydance-esque moves that sent her gracefully swaying to and fro, as though the enormous sphere of purple lard were nothing more than hippo-coloured liquid dissolving through a glass of water. She was, in short, magnificent.

And if Ruby and Jasmine didn't get here soon, Pearl would have to have to explain to her why there wouldn't be a show tonight. Frankly, the thought didn't settle well.

She paced about frantically, checking her phone for word from her teammates – still nothing. Getting frustrated she sat down, just as one of the match organisers walked into the changing room.

"Pearl? Is it Pearl?" asked the young mare.

"Yeah, that's me. Is something wrong?"

"We've just had a call from your friends – they're really sick, and can't make it."

Pearl's heart sank; and she'd waited so long for this opportunity!

"So… what do I do?"

The mare looked over her shoulder. "I'm not sure – hold on, Bertha'll be here in a sec, she'll know what we're doing…"

"Bertha?!?" the kittengirl yelped, standing up. "She's coming here, now?" she cried with excitement. Even fi she didn't get to go on, just meeting her heroine would be enough…

Sure enough, the mare left, and after a moment, Bertha herself strode into the room. Pearl stepped back a little – was it possible she was even bigger than she looked on TV?

The huge hippo sauntered in, she towered over Pearl, looking down in the fluffy newbie. The mere sight of this gigantic champion made Pearl's ears droop a little.

"Um… I, uh… it's a real honour, Miss Bertha! I mean – uh – this is just so awesome! I've followed you since I was little – "

"Lemme guess…" interrupted Bertha "You're my biggest fan?"

Pearl paused, stumbled. "Oh, well, um… well, I'm sure people say that a lot, but – "

"Yeah, they do…" she said, sitting down on the bench, causing the whole structure to groan and creak. Pearl noticed that Bertha was taking some of her weight on her feet even as she sat down – presumably to keep the bench beneath her enormous ass in one piece. Thoughts of what it must feel like to be trapped under her butt when she simply sat on a near-defeated opponent, sparing no weight at all, crossed Pearl's part-nervous, part-admiring mind. Tentatively, she went over to the bench, and stood up on it; noting that even when she stood on the same bench Bertha was sitting on, the kittengirl still only came up to Bertha's shoulder.

"So, um… My teammates haven't arrived yet… what do you want me to do?"

"Hmm… you're an amateur, right?"

Pearl nodded, eager to try and get on the giant's good side. "Uh-huh! This is my first time, miss. I just wanna start and then never stop, just keeping taking more and more matches, you know? I mean, I know I'll never be as good as you, but even to be a fraction as talented would be the greatest thing ever!"
Bertha smiled, and relaxed back a little, enjoying the praise. "Mmm, you know how to show respect… you know, I should cancel your match, what with your teammates not showing… buuut… I like you. You're kinda cute 'n' fluffy, just like the kind of pet I always wanted."

Pearl smiled, and nervously said "Thank you", but wasn't completely sure how to take such a remark.

"Tell you what. I'll still let you fight by yourself against the other team, but I want you to do something for me." said the hippo with a grin.

"…By myself? I'm not sure I can really handle that…" Pearl replied, fumbling a little.

"It's all about getting a reputation. No-one'll expect you to win, but you'll get noticed for it. Besides, it's better than not fighting at all, right?"

"Um…" The amateur paused. "Well, I guess you're right – you are the champ, after all, but what would I have to do for you?"

Bertha rolled onto her hip a little on the bench, smirking. "What would you be willing to do, little one?"

Pearl suddenly felt like a shrimp staring into the jaws of a shark, and almost let out a little 'meep', forcing herself not to tremble.

"Let me clarify, hmm?" the champ continued. "You're a member of my website, right?"

"Well, of course I am! I'm always on the lookout for your next venue, and I signed up for all the emails about your news updates and everything!" she squeaked, still wondering where this was going.

Bertha laughed at her enthusiasm; "Well then, I guessing you've seen the new 'Fanplay' page?"

"Um…"

The Fanplay page was a new addition, and it was hard to tell who'd come up with the idea – the page consisted of videos of Bertha either being served and worshipped by her fans, or by her performing some of her more famous moves on willing volunteers. In either instance, fans weren't the only ones involved – sometimes, her beaten wrestling opponents were made to make the videos with her just to further establish her dominance over them. In that case, the moves weren't toned down as they were for the fans, who just wanted to have a bit of fun – they were the real thing, the moves she'd use in the ring.

"Yeah, I know about the Fanplay page…"

Bertha smiled, putting her arm around Pearl's shoulders and pulling her closer. "Well then, I think you know what I'm about to ask…" she purred, using one arm to hug Pearl to the side of her belly – Pearl would have been smothering in her left breast had she not craned her neck as much as it would go, so that only her chin nestled in the gigantic boob. The kittengirl squirmed, not knowing where to put her hands – everything in front of her was just naked flesh, and she didn't want to offend the huge wrestler. Bertha's arm, like a warm, fleshy couchback, held her firmly in place, and shuffled up a little closer, letting the sea of blubber snuggle warmly around her. "I want two videos from you, kitten; a worship video, and an endurance video. If I like what I get, then you get your match¸ and I'll put in a good word for you with some managers who would claw each other apart for my advice. Besides, you can't say you won't enjoy it… so, whaddya say?"

Pearl was lost for a moment as she was hugged by her all-time idol, not just enjoying the mental feeling, but also the physical comfort of just being surrounded by Bertha's body, knowing that this girl was easily big enough to smother her entire body in bellyfat just made her feel, strangely, secure. She had to make herself snap out of it to reply "Y-yes… but please, go easy on me in the endurance one?"

"Oh, well, we'll see, won't we? Maybe if you're a good little subject, I'll be nice to you, hmm? Now then, who's ready to serve their queen?" Bertha grinned down at her – 'Queen' was often used by admirers when addressing Bertha, and she'd grown to like it. Pearl nodded her head meekly, creating a depression in her ordinate's breast. "I am."

"Good girl…" said the champ, releasing her grip on her, and gesturing over to her bag. Pearl moved over to it, and unzipped it; amongst other things, was a video camera and tripod. "Set it up just over there." ordered Bertha, pointing to a spot immediately opposite the bench where even her enormousness could be captured in its entirety. Dutifully, Pearl set it up, then stood anxiously.

What happens next?

125321.content:
Bertha smiled for the camera, and reclined back, creating dents and buckles in the lockers behind her until she was fully relaxed. Looking over her breasts, she fluttered her eyelids playfully at her new plaything. "Well, come on then… come worship your queen, little one…"

Pearl edged forward nervously, twiddling her fingers. "Wh-what do you want me to do?" "Hehehe, I fancy a nice, smoothing massage. Start with the belly, no gloves."

Obediently, Pearl removed her gloves and placed them on the floor. She flexed her fingers, and approached the impossibly gargantuan belly before her. Tentatively, she placed her fingertips in an area above the bellybutton, and started to stroke gently.

"L-like this?" she asked, looking up but not even being able to see her idol's face. "Hmm, not really." came the invisible reply, "Get your hands right in there. Use your palms – that is, unless you find your queen too fat to touch properly?"

"No!" she yelped instantly, "No, no, you're – you're beautiful, my queen, I'm sorry!" Pearl instantly pushed her palms up against the gut, rubbing with the flat of her hands. As she did so, she couldn't help but gaze at the quivering mass beneath her hands – the way the smooth blubber swirled and slid under her fingers, the way even the slightest tap made ripples and jiggles… as a pachyderm, Bertha's skin was incredibly thick, and yet it seemed so flexible… but, at the same it wasn't 'runny' – the fat felt viscous, and so swayed in huge quantities rather than ugly little shakes of tiny folds of flesh.

"Ahhhh… ah, yes… that's much better…" said Bertha, her sultry voice oozing with satisfaction. "Tell me how that feels…" Pearl's mouth was starting to water slightly as she kept feeling the belly of her all-time favourite star. Secretly, she'd always found her to be really attractive, and nothing would have given more pleasure than being Bertha's favourite attendant, if she had one. Well, this was the time to impress her…

"It's so wonderful, my queen," she replied, "It's like – like the world's most comfortable cushion, like warm honey wrapped in velvet-smooth skin…"

That elicited a slight giggle from the champion – "Oh, really? 'The world's most wonderful cushion', you say? Mmm, bet you'd like to use me as your cushion, huh?"

Pearl knew the answer without having to think for a second, but she hesitated – this was all going on camera, and would be posted on the internet…

"…If I could use you as my cushion, I think I could just drift into a privileged, fatty bliss…"

The giggling started again as Bertha places her hands behind her head. "Ahhh, that's right, little kitten! You KNOW you'd love it… so why don't we combine the two, hmm? I want to feel you massage me with your whole body. Just press yourself into my tummy, rub me with your arms and your torso, and squeeze and snuggle my gorgeous form up against you!"

Pearl was stunned – what an invitation! It normally took at least half an hour of worship before she moved on to something like that. She had to take the chance – and so, barely suppressing the smile on her face, pushed herself into Bertha's belly, using all the strength in her legs to prop herself inwards. Spreading her arms wide, she hugged the massive stomach, squeezing and playing with it like a big lump of dough – pushing it up with her hands, feeling the incredible weight bearing down on her arms even from something so simple; then, tugging it around herself as though trying to pinch herself inside a giant vertical fold of her own making.

"Awww, who's a good girl, huh? Who's a sweet little subject?" cooed Bertha.

"…Meeee…" came the dreamily contented reply as Pearl plunged herself further and further into bliss.

"Hmhmhm, do you like your mistress? Is she a good queen?"

"…Mmmmm… mmm, yes…" The kitten purred, her eyes glazing over.

"Then show me – snuggle your cheek against me, too."

Obeying in ecstasy, Pearl closed her eyes, and snuggled the side of her face against the warm, vibrating wall of flesh. Purring deeply, she rubbed her cheek into the tummy, listening the clinking of Bertha's jewellery as her belly shifted around. By now, Pearl's whole body from the knees up was pressed into her, moving and twisting and plunging and rubbing the hippo's gut. Soon, merely rubbing her cheek against her queen wasn't enough – Pearl turned her face inwards, and in the spur of the moment, lovingly kissed the flowing mass of fat.

"Oooh, kitten! Do I feel a little bit of kissing down there?"

Pearl froze, pulling her body back and stepping away a few paces so she could look at Bertha's face. Thankfully, it was smiling.

"Hehehe, good girl… see now, THAT'S how you worship, people!" Bertha laughed to the camera. "Ahhhh, that felt very good… Right, that's the worship part done – now, prepare yourself for the endurance!"

Pearl quivered – she had a horrible feeling this wasn't going to be nearly as fun. "W-wasn't that enough? I mean, I did good, right?"

"Hehe, tut tut, little one – you can't just have fun with me without payin' up!"

"But – but didn't you enjoy it too? I mean I WAS giving you a massage…"

"Girl, do you want to fight tonight or not?"

Pearl trembled, feeling very, very trapped. "But I – I don't want to be crushed under you!"

"Should've thought about that before you agreed to this. C'mon girl, I'm doin' you a favour here by letting you fight, and by recommending you upwards if you do well, so get over here."

Pearl's eyes were now starting to well up as she imagined all of that fat on top of her – this wasn't a ring, she couldn't dodge her, and there'd be no ref to save her skin if it looked like she'd had enough. Even so, if she tried to resist, she knew Bertha was graceful and agile enough – despite her size – to catch her with those belly-dancer-style attacks and movements. The thought of that belly she had just caressed so lovingly to now punish her like Bertha undoubtedly would was just too cruel an irony to bear. Sure, she loved Bertha, and would leap at the chance for a play-fight with her, but somehow this didn't feel like it would be playing…

"Baby, don't make me come to you. Come on over here and take your punishment for the camera…" the champ sang impatiently.

Pearl didn't need to be told again. She walked up to her, blinking back tears of apprehension. "W-what do – "

"Lie on the floor." said Bertha, lifting her belly up in her hands to reveal floor tiles beneath it. "Under there. Then we'll move on to some other stuff."

So it was going to be the belly – to start with, she thought. Termbling, she lay on the ground beneath the huge hovering stomach. Bertha giggled, jiggling it in her hands over the kitten's body. "Ya ready?"

"Um, are you going to go easy on me then? You said if I did well in the massage – "

"I said we'd see. And sorry, but nope!" And before Pearl could squeal in protest, Bertha let go of her gut. All of that belly slammed down, completely covering the poor newbie beneath as the sitting hippo grinned playfully. Pearl wriggled beneath, pushing up handfuls of fat in her palms.

"Mmmmph! Mmm-mmmph!" She pleaded from under her, straining to lift even handfuls of lard. She could raise her knees a little, just enough to prop her feet flat on the floor, but the weight quickly overpowered them and pinned them firmly back on the floor again. Her arms rapidly weakened as she fought to hold off the plethora of pounds all over her body.

"Awww, whassa matter?" Bertha baby-talked; "Too much weight for da widdle kitty? That's a real shame, because I'm sitting with my back all stwaight right now – I really wanna lean forward so I can squish the kitty!"

Panic now set in as the crushing, overbearing weight took its toll – Pearl's arms were finally forced down either side of her head. Defenceless, her ribcage was squeezing from above by the so-rumoured tons of flesh; no-one really knew how accurate her nickname of "Six-Ton Bertha" was – it could even be more – because she never let on as to her weight. All anyone knew was that she was ALWAYS gaining.

Just as things looked at their worst and felt at their heaviest, the pressure increased – Bertha was leaning forward, actively pushing her belly down on top of Pearl's rapidly-bruising body. Even if surrender was an option – which Pearl doubted – there was no way she'd be able to convey that to her new 'mistress', as no part of her could be seen.

"Mmm… you know somethin'? Thinkin' about how you were saying that I'd make a lovely cushion – well, so do you!" Bertha laughed as she patted her tummy down. Pearl could just about hear her, straining not only with the impossible weight, but now also the heat from being cramped under such an enormous amount of flesh and being completely covered by it, like being inside a huge, fleshy oven. Pearl tried one last time to push the belly up, but all she succeeded in doing was wiggling her fingers.

Which, amazingly, worked. The belly seemed to lift off a little as Pearl wriggled her digits in the fat – shaking at first, then alleviating a little more, then a little more, until eventually Pearl could see the light of the changing rooms once again. She rolled out, panting and tasting the fresh air, rather than the sweaty, hot, humid air underneath her there, and was confused to find Bertha was laughing – uncontrollably.

"Ahahaha! Aha! H-hey, I didn't say you could do that!"

"Do what?"

"Tickle me! I NEVER let anyone tickle me!" she wheezed, getting the last chuckles out of her system. She seemed happy enough though.

1253212.content:
"Oh," mumbled Pearl, "I'm sorry, I didn't know you were ticklish…"

"Ooh, haha, it – it's fine…" Bertha giggled, calming down. At that moment, the door to the changing room seemed to slam shut. Pearl's ears pricked up, and she moved over to the door.

"Huh? Was someone watching?"

"Don't sweat it," Bertha purred, "People spy on me all the time. Now then…" She continued, standing up and patting the area of the bench she was just sat on. "If you'd like to take a seat, we'll get going with the finale."

Pearl's ears drooped once more as she gazed with fear at the bench. "Wasn't that it? I mean, it's not like you can actually – um – sit on me… I mean, I'm way too small for that, so it would just be silly to even…"

She trailed off, seeing the near-gleeful expression on Bertha's expectant face, and knew that she had no choice. Timidly, she moved over, and sat down.

"O-okay, I'm agreeing to do this, but the belly was way too much, you have to go easy on me this time… please?" she pled meekly. Bertha simply turned around, showing Pearl that huge, shaking ass of hers. Two perfect, smooth half-spheres of fat, each buttock as wide and as tall as Pearl's height. Slowly, deliberately,

Bertha stepped back. Pearl instinctively put up her hands, trying to hold off the oncoming avalanche of ass, but it didn't slow Bertha's progress one bit; in fact, Bertha simply gave her booty a few horizontal shakes, which quickly swatted Pearl's hands away. What was alarming that whilst her butt was getting closer, it wasn't descending – it was heading straight for Pearl's scared-looking face.

"Uh, um, Bertha, why are you – arh! Umph – mmmph!" Pearl yelped as the asscheeks closed around over her face, continuing to push her back until she was pressed hard against the lockers behind her. Bertha sniggered at the kittengirl, whose nose was now wedged considerably deep into what could only be described as Bertha's insanely large butt-cleavage.

"Mmmm, that feels good…" cooed the hippo, shaking her butt around like a dancer. "Hehehe, are you having fun in there, kitten?"
Pearl, although it couldn't possibly be seen, was blushing incredibly hard, her arms forcibly spread across the seemingly endless cheeks and pushing with what little strength – the effects were nominal at best, and didn't noticeably help anything. As the booty-shaking returned, poor Pearl felt herself being pummelled on all sides by swinging, crashing flesh. being tossed and squeezed at the same time was an odd feeling – if it wasn't so uncomfortable for her, Pearl probably would have spend a bit more time thinking about it. As it was, it was hard to enjoy the hot, sweating interior of Bertha's move – one of her more humiliating ones, too.

"I think I do the best Stinkfaces, don't you, subject?" Bertha crooned, rolling her ass in circles, gyrating her hips to give Pearl a more thorough smothering. "Don't worry, I'm not gonna go the whole way and fart on ya – after all, I'm going EASY on you, remember?"

Whilst Pearl was grateful for that, it was hard to take comfort in much right now. She thanked her luck that this wasn't before an audience, or the humiliation would drive her to tears – but then, as she remembered the camera and the prospect of this going online, it was indeed going before an audience.

Just as she considered having a little weep inside the torturous butt, a butt she'd always privately wanted to pamper but in no way like this, a strange sensation came over her… it was almost enjoyment, but it was extremely similar to the feeling she had when cuddling Bertha's belly – a feeling of warmth, and security. Once you got past the idea that this security was being forced on her quite vehemently, she felt as though she could start to like it… even though it was crushing and humiliating, there was a sense that she had been chosen for this, and that Bertha had picked her out because she enjoyed doing it and, in a vicarious kind of way, was going to help her out by getting her back into the match. There was a feeling that no-one else, just HER, was behind this ass, receiving this extremely 'personal' treatment, and that with someone as big and as powerful as Bertha doing this to her – which was, after all, a toned-down version of the actual move – no-one would be able to hurt her. In a strange way, it felt like the hippo was a large, protective shield from anyone who would wish her ill. As she drifted into this state of gratitude, she rethought her position – after all, wasn't she being snuggled deep into the flesh of her heroine?

With renewed vigour, Pearl squirmed, pushing herself in, hugging the thunderous cheeks to herself and revelling in the warmth. Soon though, the jiggling stopped, and Bertha slid her ass down, coming down to sit on Pearl's lap with a soft squish of butt on bench. The hippo looked over her shoulder.

"…How was that, sugar?"

Pearl panted, her back squished to the lockers and her lap helplessly pinned to the bench. "…It was, um… it was a privilege, my queen." she said, remembering she was meant to be worshipping her.

"Hm-hm-hm, did I feel you having yourself a lil' snuggle back there, sweetie?" she teased, giving her hips a quick waggle.

Pearl tried to curl up, but of course, couldn't as the full force of Bertha's weight pressed on her legs and lower stomach. "I… yeah…" she admitted, blushing once more. "But, could you stand up please?"

"Oh? Why should I?" Bertha replied, her grin becoming broader.

"Because I'm starting to lose feeling in my legs!" She squeaked pitifully.

"Hmm… well… okay then."

Bertha mercifully stood up, turning the camera off. Pearl took a few deep breaths, massaging her legs. "Hehe, was I heavy on you?" "No, light as a feather, my queen." "The camera's off now, you can stop calling me that. Actually, no – I kinda like it." Bertha playfully tickled Pearl between the ears, letting the kitten purr with pleasure. "But let me just say…" Bertha murmured with a grin, "Never, ever call me 'light'; I worked hard to get this big."

She sauntered over to the door, packing the camera away. "I have to say though, you've more than earned your fight back – that was by far my favourite video to make. We'll put on some smaller shows whilst you have a massage and prepare yourself, okay?"

Pearl smiled weakly. "Th-thank you, miss."

"No problem girl. Oh, and don't worry, I'll blur out your face on the video; you look like the bashful type. See you later on!"

Pearl beamed as Bertha left the changing room. "I-It was nice meeting you, ma'am!" she called after her. "Nice meeting you too, newbie!" came the sultry reply as the champ made her way down the corridor.

Pearl stood up gingerly, stretching out some, and went to look for the masseuse's room. She still had to fight three people in a tag-team match with no team, but even if she lost, she felt like she'd gotten way more than what she'd came for. She just had to hope that she was up against three weaklings…

Unfortunately for her, she wasn't.

Jerry Brown is a young adult male, 21 years old, who hails from the City of Manopolis.

Jerry recently had a bad break up with his girlfriend and is eager to start a new life a city away from his ex.

However the next city over was the Zootopia, the Anthro capital of the world, but Jerry doesn’t mind he just wants to leave and start a new life.

Jerry managed to find a great deal on a two bedroom apartment building in uptown, and was able to move in as soon as he arrived in the city.

It took the young man a while to unpack all of his belongings but when he was finished he was pleased with himself and his brand new home.

“Now it’s time to sit back and relax” Jerry told himself as he plopped down on his new sofa, but as soon as Jerry sat down he heard a knock at his door. Puzzled by the interruption, Jerry wondered who it could possibly be.

12533211.content:
When Jerry opened his apartment door he wasn’t entirely sure what to expect, but he was shocked to see a 10ft green hair hippo and a 12ft blond elephant. Both were robust women with extra large features and both shared a striking beauty.

“Hi, I’m Bertha Hippo” the purple skin hippo said with a sly smile and cool voice.

“And I’m Jumba Elephant, were your neighbors” the busy blonde said as she showed more excitement than her purple skin friend.

“We’re your neighbors and we thought we should come over and introduce ourselves” Bertha said as she held out her left hand in a gesture that seemed both welcoming and warm, but as soon as Jerry took Berthas hand she grinned his and crushed in her massive palm.

Now normally Jerry would have pulled away out of pain, but the act of touching a beautiful woman was worth all the pain in the world.
